thread.section_title: Carid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Carid | www.carid.com
thread.title: bll shultz

author: bll shultz
title: bll shultz
text: Once I had the correct part number for the item I needed. I started checking costs on-line. I had never use Carid before. I went to my favorite three on-line contacts. Then I found Carid. Glad a did. They had the pary I needed. Half the cost of the GM dealer. Even better prices than the three other stores I normally order from on-line. Will for sure be using Carid again for my auto parts needs. Thank you.
